attributes.action: Stop the Drysalters public house from being demolished for a Costa coffee
attributes.additional_details: The pub sits opposite a council estate and is the only one for a mile in the area. It’s a community pub and is vital it stays open, to create local jobs for people in the area, and to support vulnerable people too
attributes.background: The pub has been there since the 1960’s and is used by a wide range of people. From football fans to people attending funerals and celebrating the life of their loved ones. I want to stop it from being demolished and replaced with a coffee shop, as it’s not beneficial to the area it is surrounding

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local planning issues are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
